Texts.Chs: 你应该警惕蜜蜂的天敌：^orange;瓦螨^reset;。这种寄生虫会在逐渐在蜂箱内滋生，降低蜂蜜产量甚至杀死蜜蜂。制造^orange;抗瓦螨巢框^reset;来对付他们。
Texts.Eng: It should be noted that bees have a natural predator: ^green;Mites^reset;. These parasites infest your apiaries from time to time, and reduce their productivity and can even kill the bees. Create an ^orange;Anti-Mite frame^reset; to combat them.

Texts.Chs: 把它装在养蜂场就能见效。^red;瓦螨惧怕这些东西^reset;，会被驱走或杀死。多准备一些。我已经没什么可教的了，剩余的就要靠你试验了，祝你好运。
Texts.Eng: Simply placing this in an apiary will work its magic. ^red;Mites hate these things^reset; and will be killed or driven off by them. Keep some handy. That's all I can teach you, it's up to you to experiment and breed the best bees you can! Bee all you can bee!
